system.description:
Your versatile connection to both magic and the elements allows you to shape the world around you and your own magic, all while retaining your own shape when it is threatened. You gain the following benefits:

  • At the start of your turn, you can exchange spell points for sorcery points at an exchange rate of 2 spell points per sorcery point or you may exchange sorcery points for spell points at an exchange rate of 2 sorcery points per spell point. No action is required.
  • Half your sorcerer levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining the damage dealt by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast}.
  • Half your sorcerer levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.z2q6kb24eks8nfy5]{Expand Element}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.1crnox672gxav694]{Improved Expand Element}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6cdgfoktap5bxuwz]{Greater Expand Element} features.
  • You are immune to any effect that would alter your form against your will.
